Research Interests

Modelling, analysis and resource allocation in distributed and interconnected systems with a special focus on wireless, social and transportation networks.

Openings

I am currently looking for motivated Ph. D. students. While my preferred areas of research are theoretical in nature, I am open to exploring experimental/simulation-based approaches. If you are interested to work with me, do write to me along with a one page write-up about the research topic which you wish to pursue.
